summary: An interactive Dash‑based application that loads a speech dataset manifest and provides visual exploration tools such as statistical overviews, audio waveform and spectrogram displays, transcription accuracy metrics, and side‑by‑side comparison of multiple ASR model predictions.
business_intent: Enable speech technology teams to quickly assess data quality, diagnose recognition errors, and benchmark different ASR models, thereby accelerating development and improvement of speech recognition and synthesis systems.
